Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.notification

Class NotificationsPreferenceImpl

java.lang.Object
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.notification.NotificationsPreferenceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotificationsPreference
public class NotificationsPreferenceImpl extends Object implements NotificationsPreference
This class is responsible for configuring notification preferences

      public void setSoundEnabled(android.content.Context context, Boolean enabled)
      Sets notification sound enabled / disabled
      Specified by:
      setSoundEnabled in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      enabled - true for sound enabled and false or null for sound disabled

    • isSoundEnabled

      public boolean isSoundEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if the notification sound is enabled,
      Specified by:
      isSoundEnabled in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      true if the notification sound is enabled and false if it's disabled. The default value is false.

    • setSound

      public void setSound(android.content.Context context, Integer sound)
      Sets the notification sound
      Specified by:
      setSound in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      sound - The sound resource id. Null for no sound

    • getSound

      public Integer getSound(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the notification sound resource id
      Specified by:
      getSound in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The notification sound resource id. Null will be returned if no sound was defined.

      Define if the device will vibrate on notification receive.
      Specified by:
      setVibrateEnabled in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:

      enabled - true if vibration is enabled and false or null if it's disabled.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • setVibrationPattern

      public void setVibrationPattern(android.content.Context context, long[] vibratePattern)
      Sets the notification vibration pattern. This will only have an affect if vibration is enabled.
      Specified by:
      setVibrationPattern in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      vibratePattern - The vibration pattern. Null for default OS pattern. An empty array will not change the current pattern.

    • getVibrationPattern

      public long[] getVibrationPattern(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification vibration pattern.
      Specified by:
      getVibrationPattern in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The vibration pattern. Default is null.

      Specified by:
      setIcon in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      icon - The notification icon resource id. Null for default OS icon (android.R.drawable.sym_def_app_icon)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:

    • isLightsEnabled

      public boolean isLightsEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if the notification lights are enabled.
      Specified by:
      isLightsEnabled in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:

    • setLights

      public void setLights(android.content.Context context, int[] lightsPref)
      Configures the notification light preferences. This will only have an affect if notification lights are enabled.
      Specified by:
      setLights in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      lightsPref - The lights preferences. Null for default OS light. An empty array will not change the lights preferences definition.

    • getLights

      public int[] getLights(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification lights preferences.
      Specified by:
      getLights in interface NotificationsPreference
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The defined lights preferences. Default is the OS default lights preferences.

      Defines the added flags for the notification intent
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      flags - The added flags. Null for Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP.

    • getFlags

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
